FuncDef: The dsa local-key-pair destroy command deletes all local DSA key pairs, including the host key pair and server key pair. The dsa local-key-pair destroy command deletes all local DSA key pairs, including the host key pair and server key pair. By default, no local DSA keys are created.
Examples: Warning: These keys will be destroyed. Continue? Please select [Y/N]: Y
ExtraInfo: If you no longer need the local DSA key pairs, run the dsa local-key-pair destroy command to delete them.
